name: Deck
author: Leon Zhang
description: A box in which cards can be cycled independently of order with a variety of different transitions

documentation.description: A box in which cards can be cycled independently of order with a variety of different transitions

attributes.transition-type: Defines the kind of transition animation that is used when cycling cards. Valid options: 'scrollLeft', 'scrollUp', 'scrollRight', 'scrollDown', 'flipX', 'flipY', 'none'

events.shuffleend: fired by the x-deck element when a card transition animation has finished

methods.shuffleTo: Transitions to the x-card at the given index. If given a progressType of 'forward', will perform the forwards animation. If given 'reverse', will performs the reverse animation. If the progressType is 'auto' or omitted, will perform forward animation if going to a larger index, and will perform reverse animation if going to a smaller index. Also takes an optional callback function.
methods.shuffleNext: Transitions to the next x-card in the deck. Takes an optional progressType of 'forward', 'reverse', or 'auto'. Also takes an optional callback function.
methods.shufflePrev: Transitions to the previous x-card in the deck. Takes an optional progressType of 'forward', 'reverse', or 'auto'. Also takes an optional callback function.
methods.getAllCards: Returns a list of all x-card elements in the deck.
methods.getSelectedCard: Returns the currently selected x-card in the deck.
methods.getCardIndex: Given an x-card element, returns its index in this deck, if it is a child element.

getters.transition-type: Returns the kind of transition animation that is used when cycling cards. Valid options: 'scrollLeft', 'scrollUp', 'scrollRight', 'scrollDown', 'flipX', 'flipY', 'none'

setters.transition-type: Sets the kind of transition animation that is used when cycling cards. Valid options: 'scrollLeft', 'scrollUp', 'scrollRight', 'scrollDown', 'flipX', 'flipY', 'none'
